control_objective: Ensure networks are segmented and protected from unauthorized access

control_objective: Keep systems hardened and configured to approved baselines

implementation_guidance: Use strong encryption and tokenization; minimize storage and retention

control_objective: Ensure sensitive data is protected while moving across networks
implementation_guidance: Enforce TLS 1.2+ and secure key management for all transmissions

control_objective: Detect and prevent malware across endpoints and servers

Limit access to sensitive data and systems to authorized roles

control_objective: Ensure all access is uniquely identified and strongly authenticated
implementation_guidance: Require MFA for admin and remote access; rotate secrets regularly

control_objective: Protect facilities and hardware from physical compromise
Provide audit trails and timely detection of suspicious activity
Validate security controls through regular testing
implementation_guidance: Run quarterly vulnerability scans and annual penetration tests

control_objective: Establish policies and training that sustain compliance
